cast.overview: After being bitten by a genetically altered spider at Oscorp, nerdy but endearing high school student Peter Parker is endowed with amazing powers to become the superhero known as Spider-Man.
cast.title: Spider-Man

details.biography:
Chris Coppola is an American actor.

Coppola is best known for such films as Friday the 13th, Far Cry, Postal, Loveless in Los Angeles, The Polar Express and Beowulf.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Chris Coppola, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Chris Coppola
